articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Iranian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Iranian Ambassador to DPRK
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, had a talk with Iranian Ambassador to the DPRK Mansour Chavoshi who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK Meets Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK Meets Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday met and had a talk with Jonathan Powell, chief executive officer of the Inter Mediate, and his companion on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegations of Overseas Koreans Here
articles.content:
Delegations of Overseas Koreans Here
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by Chairman Yun Kil Sang and a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo arrived here Wednesday to commemorate the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Won Baek, chairman of the Canada Western Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, came here on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from DR Congo
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from DR Congo
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Henri Mova Sakanyi, secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral basket was placed at the statues on Wednesday.
					
					 On the same day, a floral basket from Mienze Kiaku, former deputy secretary general of the Party of DR Congo, was also laid before the statues.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in China Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in China Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The members of the delegation laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: National Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Art Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A national art exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the Korean Art Gallery on Wednesday ahead of the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the centre of the exhibition is a picture depicting Kim Jong Il standing on the top of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Exhibited there are art pieces dealing with Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and his personality as a great man and dozens of art works showing the picture of the country where Kim Jong Il's behests are carried into practice under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Ri Ryong Nam, officials concerned and working people of Pyongyang City.
					
					 Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam made an opening address.

articles.title: Korean Stamp Exhibitions Open
articles.content:
Korean Stamp Exhibitions Open
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Korean stamp exhibitions were  opened at the venue of the exhibition of Korean stamps and the Korean Stamps Museum on Wednesday on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Stamps of hundreds of kinds are on display under the titles "Five years of yearning" and "Great career." They make visitors recollect with deep emotion the revolutionary career and feats and patriotic devotion of Kim Jong Il who provided an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 There are stamps showing revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites successfully built into centers for education in the revolutionary traditions under the leadership of the Party and the West Sea Barrage and other monumental edifices representing the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 Drawing the attention of visitors are stamps dealing with the heroic struggle of the army and people to bring about epoch-making changes under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The exhibitions will last till Dec. 23.

articles.title: Workers and Trade Union Members Renew Their Pledge
articles.content:
Workers and Trade Union Members Renew Their Pledge
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- There took place at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday a meeting of workers and trade union members to vow to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution and to remain loyal to the Songun revolutionary guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 It was attended by Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the WPK, union officials, workers and union members.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, made a report at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the nation is observing its greatest memorial day, the lapse of five years since Kim Jong Il passed away too suddenly to its bitterest sorrow.
					
					 They said that the past five years during which the Korean people have always  missed Kim Jong Il very much, looking up to his beaming image, were a period in which they keenly felt what great happiness they have enjoyed  under the guidance of the great leader.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly great man and a great sage of revolution as he laid an eternal foundation for victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun, they stressed.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un, the revolutionary cause of Juche is making dynamic progress along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, they said, stressing the need to develop the whole federation into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and a united body whose destiny is closely linked with the yard of the Central Committee of the Party.

articles.title: Statement of FM Spokesman of DPRK Distributed as Official Document of UN General Assembly and UNSC
articles.content:
Statement of FM Spokesman of DPRK Distributed as Official Document of UN General Assembly and UNSC
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The statement issued by a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK to disclose the illegality of the UNSC's "sanctions resolution" pulling up the DPRK over its  nuclear warhead explosion test for self-defence was distributed as an official document of the UN General Assembly and the UNSC A/71/649-S/2016/1023 on Tuesday.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 90th Anniversary of Saenal Children's Union
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 90th Anniversary of Saenal Children's Union
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday to mark the 90th anniversary of the Saenal Children's Union formed by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Il Sung formed the Saenal Children's Union, a new type revolutionary organization of children, on December 15, Juche 15 (1926).
					
					 The Saenal Children's Union was a vanguard organization of the Korean children who struggled against the Japanese imperialists to achieve the liberation and independence of the country and build a new society where the working masses are well off. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Su Gil, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and teachers and schoolchildren in Pyongyang.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, said in his report that the history of the Korean children's movement since the formation of the Saenal Children's Union is a proud and glorious course of steadfastly carrying forward the lineage of the revolution under the guidance of the great leaders and the great party.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung set forth the duty and task of the Saenal Children's Union and norm of life for its members and established a well-regulated work system for it. He led the union to dynamically conduct various forms of education and mass political activities such as reading session, story-telling, seminar and art troupe activities and thus powerfully rouse the broad strata of children and people to the struggle against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The Juche-based children's movement started and victoriously led by Kim Il Sung could develop on a higher level under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The children's movement is now greeting a great heyday of its development under the care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the reporter said. 
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the movement of the Korean children as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il wish the young students and children good luck for their bright future and supreme leader Kim Jong Un wisely leads the movement of the Korean children, they added.

articles.title: Gift Animals at Central Zoo in DPRK
articles.content:
Gift Animals at Central Zoo in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Zoo located at the foot of Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang of the DPRK houses over 400 animals of at least 200 species presented to leader Kim Jong Il by prominent personages and people of different countries and overseas Koreans.
					 Among them are white rhinoceros and parrot with gray-red train sent by state leaders and rare animals and an animal hall proffered by the director of the Skansen Aquarium in Sweden.
					
					 A Korean resident in China presented white tigers to Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Staff Members of UNICEF Mission Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Staff Members of UNICEF Mission Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the UNICEF Mission here Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill with the approach of the fifth anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Visits Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital
articles.content:
Chief Executive Officer of Inter Mediate Visits Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Jonathan Powell, chief executive officer of the Inter Mediate, and his companion visited the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital Wednesday. 
					 Being briefed on the hospital, they looked round outpatient ward, glasses shop and other parts of it.
					
					 The chief executive officer made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: "Saenuri Party", Hotbed of Misrule and Corruption: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
"Saenuri Party", Hotbed of Misrule and Corruption: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Now unabated in south Korea is a struggle demanding the dissolution of the "Saenuri Party" along with the resignation of Park Geun Hye.
					 Massive protests are staged before buildings of the "Saenuri Party" and office of "lawmakers" in Youido of Seoul, Taegu, Taejon, Inchon, Changwon and other areas.
					
					 Flag symbolic of the traitorous political party is being torn to pieces amid the uproar of the people demanding the dissolution of the "Saenuri Party".
					
					 This is the eruption of the indignation and curses at the party which turned south Korea into a barren land of human rights and democracy and den of corruption by acting a servant and spokesman for traitor Park.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is a traitorous political party which produced the corrupt and incompetent Park Geun Hye regime and a group of the worst traitors which should face stern punishment by the nation together with Park Geun Hye as an accomplice in the hideous political scandal.
					
					 It is none other than coteries of the "Saenuri Party" which installed the descendent of the "yusin" dictator Park as "president" disguised as "politician of confidence and principle" and grew corpulent by blindly following Park who was no more than marionette of a shaman. 
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is a group of wicked criminals who should have been thrown into the cemetery of history long ago.
					
					 Since it disclosed its despicable nature as "Liberal Party" of traitor Syngman Rhee, the "Saenuri Party" has covered the shameful road of treachery, changing its names from "Democratic Republican Party", "Party of Democracy and Justice", "Party of Liberal Democracy", "New Korea Party" to "Grand National Party". It is recorded with sycophancy and treachery, fascist dictatorship and human rights abuses.
					
					 Looking back on the traitorous political party, their main players were without exception top-class sycophants and traitors, fascist murderers, anti-reunification maniacs and ill-famed kingpin of thieves.
					
					 No wonder, south Koreans are spitting at the "Saenuri Party" as the citadel of traitorous politics and corruption and irregularities.
					
					 The party has earned ill-fames from the south Koreans like "party of confrontation with fellow countrymen", "party mad on pro-U.S.", "war party", "anti-reunification party", "conservative and cold-war party", "rubbish party", "Mafia party", "party embezzling truckloads of money", "scandalous political party", "lustful party" and "sexual scandal party". Clearly reflected in these names is the despicable nature of the traitorous political party.
					
					 If the "Saenuri Party" is left intact, the second Park Geun Hye and second Choe Sun Sil will appear, making south Koreans subject to unavoidable disgrace, distress, misfortune and pain.
					
					 Recently the "Saenuri Party" is trying hard to find a stop-gap measure while talking about its "revamp" after the passage of a motion calling for Park's impeachment through the "National Assembly." But it is a foolish act.
					
					 It is the south Korean public mindset never to bring down the torch of struggle until the pro-U.S. conservative forces including Park and the "Saenuri Party" are swept away and a new society where people have become master of politics is built.
					
					 The resignation of Park and the dissolution of the "Saenuri Party" may take place any time.

articles.title: "Saenuri Party" Should Be Disbanded: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Saenuri Party" Should Be Disbanded: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Now the south Korean people and opposition parties demand the immediate resignation of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 But the gentry of the ruling "Saenuri Party" insist that they cannot raise a white flag, talking about "violation of law". They openly deny the popular masses' just punishment of the traitorous policy, claiming that "there was no direct investigation" and there is a "lack of grounds" as regards the impeachment of Park.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 This is a shameless act to hold in check the resignation of Park Geun Hye at any cost. 
					
					 The gentry of the "Saenuri Party" have no face to talk about the present situation in south Korea. The "Saenuri Party" is a party of traitors that gave birth to the corrupt regime of Park Geun Hye, a group of accomplices in the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal" which drove south Korea into chaos and a bulwark of treacherous policies and corruption and scandals that should be sternly punished along with traitor Park.
					
					 At present, the anti-Park Geun Hye faction and other conservative forces within the "Saenuri Party" cry out for "fresh conservatism", seeking "to distance themselves" from Park more dead than alive. This is a cynical ploy to seek a way out at the sacrifice of traitor Park who was forsaken by the people.
					
					 There should be neither expectation nor illusion about the gentry of the "Saenuri Party".

articles.title: It's DPRK's Goal to Build Peaceful World: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
It's DPRK's Goal to Build Peaceful World: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the work of its Central Committee clarified that it is the goal of the struggle of Songun Korea to build a peaceful world.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article says:
					
					 His declaration represents the steadfast will of the WPK and the DPRK government to ensure peace on the Korean peninsula and contribute to the world peace by dint of powerful self-defensive deterrent.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of the Korean people to enjoy the highest level of civilization in a peaceful environment freed from war.
					
					 But this desire does not come true naturally as one wishes. Only when a country possesses powerful physical strength and war deterrence can it guarantee genuine peace.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the harasser of the world peace and security and also the target of main attack in the efforts to accomplish the global cause of independence.
					
					 As long as there exists imperialism on the earth, confrontation is unavoidable and, therefore, for the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrence is the best decision to defend peace. 
					
					 It is an urgent matter in ensuring the peace and security of the world to avert a war and defend peace on the Korean peninsula, the biggest hotspot in the world.
					
					 The DPRK is not the only target of the U.S. It is the ulterior intention of the U.S. to contain the neighboring countries with the whole Korean peninsula as a springboard and put under its control not only the Asian-Pacific region but also the rest of the world.
					
					 It is the fixed will and stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to defend the sovereignty and peace of the country and build a peaceful world free from war by dint of powerful self-defensive muscle under the situation where the dark clouds of a nuclear war are hanging over the peninsula.

articles.title: Japan Has No Face to Talk about Women's "Rights": Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Has No Face to Talk about Women's "Rights": Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The chief executive of Japan likes to talk about the building of a "society where women are active" quite often.
					 According to his assertion, the Diet adopted legislation on promoting women's activities the keynote of which calls on big businesses, state and local bodies to make it compulsory to assign posts to women and the Cabinet created a new post of minister for women's affairs. He talked nonsense at the UN that "he would make the 21st century a world free from human rights abuses against women".
					
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says:
					
					 What matters is that the chief executive's loudmouthed guarantee of women's rights is quite contrary to the realities in Japan.
					
					 At a recent meeting of the UN human Rights Council, an expert on human rights issue disclosed that sexual abuses against girl students of secondary and senior high schools are serious in Japan.
					
					 It is a matter of serious concern that women's ill-treatment and the tendency of despising women widespread in Japan are committed at the tacit connivance of the authorities and with their backing.
					
					 The Japanese government is making desperate efforts to cover up the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, a hideous crime unprecedented in history, with a petty amount of money in collusion with the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea steeped in sycophancy and treachery to the marrow of their bones. Its ulterior aim is to realize its ambition for staging a comeback to Korea at any cost.
					
					 Japan is going so shameless as to refuse to admit the hideous human rights abuses widely known in history and condemned by mankind, adding to its monstrous crimes. Moreover, Japanese politicians are not in a position to complain about GIs' merciless abuses of its women's rights. This notwithstanding, They are talkative about the building of the above-mentioned "society" and say this or that about the "human rights issue" of someone. This makes even a cat laugh.
					
					 The ruling quarters of Japan had better properly redress the crimes related to the sexual slavery.

articles.title: Nullification of Authorities' Educational Policy Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nullification of Authorities' Educational Policy Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The newly elected chairman of the National Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) held a press conference on Monday to clarify the stand to launch a strong action for the nullification of the educational policy of the Park Geun Hye regime, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 He branded the Park Geun Hye regime's action of outlawing Jongyojo as an illegal ruling act to remove an obstacle lying in the way of abusing "state power."
					
					 He declared that the union would urge the regime and the "National Assembly" to nullify the measure for outlawing it.

articles.title: Explosion Accident Occurs at Anti-north War Exercise Ground of S. Korean Army
articles.content:
Explosion Accident Occurs at Anti-north War Exercise Ground of S. Korean Army
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- There was an explosion accident at a unit of the puppet army in Ulsan of south Korea on Tuesday, according to Yonhap News.
					 The explosion was at an anti-north urban warfare exercise ground under the 53rd division of the army.
					
					 Shrapnel and flames left more than 20 soldiers wounded, with their ankles broken and their eardrums ruptured.

articles.title: Anti- Park Geun Hye Struggles Staged in Japan
articles.content:
Anti- Park Geun Hye Struggles Staged in Japan
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A group of Korean youth in Japan staged loudspeaker van protests in various areas of Tokyo from Dec. 1 to 8 in solidarity with the south Korean people in their actions for the immediate resignation of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 Protest actions were staged outside the building of the headquarters of the South Korean Residents Association in Japan housing the south Korean consulate and outside the south Korean puppet embassy in Tokyo.

articles.title: Ecuadorian Organizations Blame UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
Ecuadorian Organizations Blame UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution"
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and other hostile forces should clearly understand that no mean move can ever bring to submission socialist Korea which is demonstrating its dignity as the fortress of justice.
					 The Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People stressed this in their joint statement on Dec. 3.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. and its followers cooked up another "sanctions resolution" by abusing the UN Security Council over the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test conducted in September, it said:
					
					 This is a criminal act to stifle the independent and righteous sovereign state.
					
					 The DPRK's test is a self-defensive measure for coping with the moves of the U.S.-led hostile forces to stifle it.
					
					 The UNSC's act against the DPRK at the U.S. instigation is sparking off the indignation of the world progressive people.
					
					 We strongly condemn the UNSC's "sanctions resolution" as the most shameful encroachment upon sovereignty.
					
					 No force can match the army and people of the DPRK led by the outstanding and brilliant commander.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place in Tanzania, Ecuador, Malaysia and Indonesia between Nov. 29 and Dec. 3.
					 The chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups and other speakers said that leader Kim Jong Il is always alive in the minds of the Korean people and the progressives and his idea and line serve as the eternal banner illuminating the road to be followed by humankind and his exploits as the eternal foundation for ensuring prosperity of socialist Korea, people's happiness and the world peace and security.
					
					 The chairman of the Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People of Ecuador said that the exploits of Kim Jong Il would shine long as the most valuable legacy for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification said that Kim Jong Il firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK by smashing the imperialists' moves to stifle it and made great contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Malaysian Committee for Remembering HE Kim Jong Il stressed that Kim Jong Il is the peerless patriot and a great revolutionary who dedicated his whole life to the country's prosperity and the people's happiness.
					
					 And he praised him as the peerlessly great man who made contributions to the human cause of independence and as the defender of the socialist cause and peace.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Remembered by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Remembered by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the Swiss Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Dec. 5 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Though leader Kim Jong Il passed away, his exploits for the country and people will remain forever, the statement said, adding:
					
					 In his lifetime he had made tireless efforts for the people's happiness, the building of a socialist power, the national reunification and the global independence.
					
					 He developed in depth the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and formulated it as a main political mode under socialism.
					
					 He made a great contribution to accomplishing the cause of the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 Thanks to his bold decision, the north-south summits took place, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted and the era of reunification advancing under the idea of By the Korean Nation Itself was ushered in.
					
					 With his Songun politics, he defended peace on the Korean Peninsula and smashed the U.S. imperialists' provocation.
					
					 The Korean people and the world progressives are remembering him in boundless reverence on the occasion of Dec. 17.
					
					 We extend eternal glory to the great leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador irani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con embajador irani
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 14 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el embajador irani en Corea, Mansour Chavoshi, quien le realizo la visita de despedida.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong conversa con ejecutor en jefe de la Inter-Mediacion
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong conversa con ejecutor en jefe de la Inter-Mediacion
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio el dia 14 con Jonathan Powell, ejecutor en jefe de la Inter-Mediacion, y su comitiva que se encuentran de visita en Corea.

articles.title: Llegan delegaciones de compatriotas en ultramar
articles.content:
Llegan delegaciones de compatriotas en ultramar
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 5o aniversario de deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, llegaron el dia 14 a esta capital la delegacion de la Asociacion Nacional de los Coreanos Residentes en Estados Unidos, dirigida por su presidente Yun Kil Sang, la otra de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China, encabezada por su vicepresidente Cha Sang Bo y el presidente de la comision de la region occidental de Canada del Comite Ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, Kim Won Baek.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion central de bellas artes
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion central de bellas artes
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 5o aniversario de deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo inaugurada la exposicion central de bellas artes.
					En el centro de la sede de exhibicion, se ve una pintura del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la cima del monte Paektu.
					
					Estan exhibidas las obras de bellas artes que muestran la vida revolucionaria y nobles personalidades del Dirigente y otras decenas que hacen conocer la realidad de la patria donde se realizan los legados del Dirigente bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Jong Un.
					
					El acto de apertura tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el Museo de Bellas Artes de Corea con la participacion de Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Ri Ryong Nam, los funcionarios interesados, asi como los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam pronuncio el discurso de la ocasion.

articles.title: Exhibidos sellos coreanos en ocasion del 17 de diciembre
articles.content:
Exhibidos sellos coreanos en ocasion del 17 de diciembre
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 5o aniversario de deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il (17 de diciembre), fueron exhibidos el dia 14 muchos sellos coreanos en la Exhibicion Permanente de Sellos de Corea y el Museo de Sellos de Corea. 
					Centenares de ejemplares, exhibidos con los titulos de "5 anos de anoranza" y "Gran vida", hacen recordar con gran emocion la vida y proezas revolucionarias y los esfuerzos patrioticos y el gran amor al pueblo del Dirigente quien preparo el eterno cimiento para la prosperidad de la potencia Paektusan. 
					
					Otros sellos presentan los lugares de batalla revolucionaria y los otros de interes historico-revolucionario, acondicionados bajo la direccion del partido como bases de educacion en la tradicion revolucionaria, y las creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo tales como Complejo Hidraulico del Mar Oeste.
					
					Se demuestra tambien la lucha heroica del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que registran cambios del siglo bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					La galeria filatelica continuara hasta el dia 23.

articles.title: Acto central por el 90o aniversario de la constitucion de Union de Ninos Saenal
articles.content:
Acto central por el 90o aniversario de la constitucion de Union de Ninos Saenal
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el 90o aniversario de la constitucion de la Union de Ninos Saenal.
					Esta organizacion infantil revolucionaria del nuevo tipo fue fundada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung el 15 de diciembre del 15 (1926) de la Era Juche. 
					
					La organizacion vanguardista de los ninos coreanos tuvo por su mision luchar por la liberacion y la independencia de la patria al derrotar al imperialismo japones y construir una nueva sociedad donde vivieran felizmente las masas populares trabajadoras. 
					
					Asistieron al acto Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Su Gil y los funcionarios de ramas interesadas y de la Union de la Juventud y los maestros y ninos escolares de esta capital. 
					
					Al presentar el informe de la ocasion, el primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud, Jon Yong Nam, dijo que la historia del movimiento infantil coreano, que data de la fundacion de la Union de Ninos Saenal, es la orgullosa y gloriosa en que bajo la guia del gran lider y gran partido, ha continuado con firmeza el linaje de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					Recordo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung enseno el deber y las tareas de lucha de la Union de Ninos Saenal y los reglamentos de vida de sus miembros, establecio el ordenado sistema de trabajo y dinamizo la educacion y las actividades politicas masivas de diferentes formas como el cenaculo de lectura, el encuentro de oratoria, el seminario y las actividades artisticas para llamar a los ninos y habitantes a la lucha contra el imperialismo japones. 
					
					Subrayo que el movimiento infantil de tipo jucheano, iniciado y conducido a la victoria por el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, se desarrollo en la nueva etapa mas alta bajo la direccion del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El movimiento infantil jucheano acoge hoy dia la era de esplendor gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, dijo y llamo a todos a marchar con vigor hacia el futuro maravilloso proyectado por el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, unidos firmemente en torno al Mariscal.

articles.title: Japon no tiene calidad de hablar de DDHH de la mujer, critica Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japon no tiene calidad de hablar de DDHH de la mujer, critica Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El mandatario japones suele hablar de la construccion de una "sociedad donde las mujeres desempenen papel importante".
					De acuerdo con su insistencia, la Dieta aprobo una ley de promocion de las actividades de la poblacion femenina que estipula la obligacion de emplear a las mujeres en las grandes empresas y las entidades estatales y locales. Entre tanto, el gabinete invento nuevo cargo de ministro encargado de las actividades de la mujer.
					
					Hasta en la escena de la ONU, el premier japones promete con fanfarroneria "hacer del siglo 21 un mundo libre de violacion de derechos humanos de la mujer".
					
					Lo problematico es que esas palabras distan mucho de la actual realidad del pais isla. 
					
					Asi critica el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 14 y prosigue.
					
					Hace poco, en una reunion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, un especialista denuncio que en Japon se tornan graves los maltratos de genero contra las alumnas de escuelas secundarias y superiores.
					
					El maltrato y el menosprecio a las mujeres en la sociedad japonesa se perpetran bajo la tolerancia de las autoridades. He aqui la gravedad del problema.
					
					Para realizar a toda costa la ambicion de reagredir a Corea, el gobierno japones intenta solucionar con una suma insignificante de dinero el problema de esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones, crimen de lesa humanidad sin precedentes, en confabulacion con la banda de Park Geun-hye, colmada de servilismo a grandes potencias y conciencia vendepatria.
					
					Japon cometio en el pasado los crimenes anti-DDHH, denunciados por la historia y la humanidad, y sus politicos se mantienen callados ante la violacion de DDHH de las japonesas por parte de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes.
					
					Sin embargo, hablan de la "sociedad donde las mujeres desempenen papel importante" y hasta cuestionan el "problema de DDHH" de alguien.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deberan liquidar primero el crimen de esclavitud sexual.
